aboutContent.aboutText:
My name is Vinícius, I am 23 years old and I have a degree in Systems Analysis and Development. Currently, I work as a Full Stack Software Engineer and I am passionate about technology and software development.

I have a strong interest in innovation and I am always looking to improve my skills, explore new technologies, and follow industry best practices to deliver efficient, scalable, and well-structured solutions.

My professional goal is to continue growing in the development field, work on challenging projects, and, in the future, secure a job opportunity abroad, where I can expand my knowledge, exchange experiences with professionals from different cultures, and contribute to the growth of global companies.

skillsContent.htmlDescription: HTML is the markup language used to structure web pages.
skillsContent.cssDescription: CSS is the styling language used to define the design and layout of web pages.
skillsContent.jsDescription: JavaScript is a programming language used to create interactivity on websites.
skillsContent.reactDescription: React is a JavaScript library for building reactive user interfaces.
skillsContent.nextDescription: Next.js is a React framework that facilitates server-side rendering and web application development.
skillsContent.tailwindDescription: Tailwind CSS is a styling framework based on utility classes.
skillsContent.tsDescription: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that adds static typing to the code.
skillsContent.cypressDescription: Cypress is an end-to-end testing framework for web applications.
skillsContent.javaDescription: Java is an object-oriented programming language widely used for backend development.
skillsContent.springDescription: Spring Boot is a Java framework that simplifies API and robust backend application development.
skillsContent.dotnetDescription: .NET is a Microsoft platform for backend and desktop application development.
skillsContent.databaseDescription: Databases are systems used to store, organize, and retrieve structured information.
skillsContent.rabbitmqDescription: RabbitMQ is a message broker that facilitates communication between microservices.
skillsContent.gitDescription: Git is a distributed version control system used to manage source code.
skillsContent.dockerDescription: Docker is a platform for creating, distributing, and running applications in containers.
skillsContent.awsDescription: AWS (Amazon Web Services) is a cloud computing platform from Amazon.

experiencesContent.experiencesText:
Currently, I have 9 months of experience in software development. In my first job, I worked as a Junior Developer in a small team, consisting of myself and a senior developer. We worked on a content management project, which includes:

- API Backend in Java with Spring Boot
- Public portal
- External portal
- Administrative panel for content management

When I joined the company, this project had already been in development for 3 years. Over time, I took on various responsibilities independently, always relying on the guidance of my senior colleague. Despite the challenges, we made significant progress, and the project is close to completion.

Main technologies used: Java 11, Spring Boot, Angular 12, GitLab, and Docker.

Starting in March 2025, I will join a new company, where I hope to gain more experience working in a team, working on large projects, and following best market practices.

Main technologies I will be using in this new role: C#, .NET Core, React.js, Next.js, and Docker.

projectsContent.tripBuilderDescription: A SaaS project for generating travel itineraries
projectsContent.tripBuilderContent: Technologies used: Next.js, Java 23, Spring, RabbitMQ, AI, Postgres SQL, Docker, AWS, CDN
projectsContent.tripBuilderFooter: Private project, will be available soon
projectsContent.rentifyDescription: Project inspired by Booking and Airbnb platforms
projectsContent.rentifyContent: Technologies used: Next.Js, Java 23, Spring, Postgres SQL, Docker
